original_body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); President Ranil Wickremesinghe appointed Ms. K.A. Rohanadheera as the new Secretary General of the Sri Lankan Parliament.
She is the current Parliament Chief-Of-Staff & Deputy Secretary General of Parliament.
The appointment will be in effect from 23rd May, 2023 and comes with the approval of the Constitutional Council, said the President's Media Division.
Japan provides $ 4.6 mn through FAO to boost paddy production
